comments.body: it would be nice to have a high level description in the script just saying this does a release which does things like tag, build, etc and pushes things to the asf spark repo.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,59 @@

+
+SELF=$(cd $(dirname $0) && pwd)
+. "$SELF/release-util.sh"
+
+while getopts "bn" opt; do
